column2: Front Yard Residential Corp. is a real estate investment trust, which engages in the acquisition and ownership of residential rental properties. The firm focuses on acquiring, owning and managing single-family rental (SFR) properties throughout the United States. The firm conducts its activities through its subsidiary, Altisource Residential, L.P., and its subsidiaries. The firm also converts a portion of the real estate owned (REO) properties that it acquires through resolution of its mortgage loans into SFR properties. The firm has also entered into property management service agreements with two third-party property managers: Altisource Portfolio Solutions, SA (ASPS) and Main Street Renewal, LLC (MSR), to provide, among other things, leasing and lease management, operations, maintenance, repair and property management services in respect of its SFR portfolios. As of August 9, 2018, the Company had approximately 15,000 homes.
